attributes.action: Contain the Coronavirus by placing patients and staff in one hospital building
attributes.additional_details:
People affected by the Coronavirus should be put in one hospital building so that the virus is less likely to spread. 
At the moment people are being treated in several hospitals up and down the UK. 
Medical staff and equipment will also only be in one place. A separate building adjoining the hospital building can house the medical staff.
attributes.background: Contain the Coronavirus by isolating those affected by putting them in one hospital building in the UK. Preferably near the coast away from everyone.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on isolation and treatment of indviduals are clincial and not political decisions.
